plot: Documentary about genealogy, portraying Danes who are searching for relatives and family. Genealogy has become a whole new ballgame with the help of the Internet, but the primary sources are still regional archives.
title: På sporet af slægten
plot_es: Documentary about genealogy, portraying Danes who are searching for relatives and family. Genealogy has become a whole new ballgame with the help of the Internet, but the primary sources are still regional archives.
plot_en: Documentary about genealogy, portraying Danes who are searching for relatives and family. Genealogy has become a whole new ballgame with the help of the Internet, but the primary sources are still regional archives.
